1.content: Which year did the story take place in?
1.title: Choose (1)

choices: Her bust grows when balloon expands
Her rear grows when balloon expands
Her weight increases when balloon expands
Her belly grows when balloon expands
She grows bigger when balloon expands
11.content: Pit and Kid were having a can of Coke. They saw these new species. They were homo sapiens, 5' tall, and in a balloon. These are no ordinary homo sapiens, though.
11.title: 1998 (Start of series)

115.title: She grows bigger when balloon expands

1153.content: Widen, get taller, or get bigger?
1153.title: Whole body

11533.content: Can she grow a bigger bust/butt?
11533.title: Both

115331.content:
Her butt will grow, and her bust will grow...

---Now back to our story---

Turns out she has an extra set of air-giving things at her bust and butt. Actually, only one...

Kid: Let's do this!

Pit: Ewwww!

Kid didn't listen, and went for the bust. It expanded to Q-cups (pretty weird, right?) and now Kid reached for her butt. It expanded a ton! It was 30 feet long!

Her butt deflated, but her bust remained Q-cups but shrunk to G-cups. She wanted in the pool, she was the weighty balloon. She wanted to be taller. She grew to 50 ft with Kid's one blow...
115331.title: Yes!

1153311.content:
Pit: Uh, why balloon her up when there are Super Mushrooms?

Kid: Premise of this story.

Kid blew her up even more, making her 200 ft. tall. Then 500 ft, and 10000 ft.

Pit: And I wasted my Chuck E. Cheese's tickets for this?

Kid: Have some Coke.

Kid blew up the balloon, POP! She had an explosive growth, growing to 207959 ft. tall. She still grew until she was 7877878866737584 ft. tall and in a multiverse.

Kid: So, that's it?

She liked her new size, grew to a proportionate 6767777878877887887 ft. tall.

Pit: Yeah, take a rocket at 65767667777 mph!

Kid: The fastest rockets go at 25000 mph.

Pit: So we have to imagine one.
1153311.title: She grew more

11533111.content:
Kid: WHAT IS IT?

Pit: Paletana told me this spell.

So they reach the multiverse.

She wanted to go home, so Kid got his Helium tank and sucked in all the air she has gotten. She shrank to 5', C-cups and a fitting display to go home.
11533111.title: It worked!

115331112.content: She enlarged her butt by 1'. She also enlarged her thighs by 1'. She enlarged her arms and hands by 1' each. She enlarged her bust by a cup size. She had a air thingy saying "Expand all parts. She grew her belly and legs and feet first. All enlarged by 1' each part. She turned the tank off, and went home and plopped herself on the couch. She wanted to grow.
115331112.title: She was ENLARGING her butt.

1153311122.content:
She got off the couch and inserted the nozzle in. Mario must have come in at that time. He was shocked. Kid and Pit have caught up with her.

Too late! She turned the nozzle up and she was getting bigger, and soon she reached the ceiling. She turned the nozzle off, and plopped down, now her butt was sticking out 60''. She had Q-cups again, and massive legs/thighs. She was 8' in height. She made it through the door. She went to a taller, taller, taller, taller structure: A hangar.

Kid: Did we mention that THEY HAVEN'T FINISHED IT YET???
1153311122.title: Excessive Growth!

choices: She stopped when she was 12 ft. tall.
11533111222.content: Once the hanger was finished, it was as tall as Freedom Tower, and wide enough for a SMB game to be played here. Mario decided, "Yeah!" The thingy's butt grew and grew, along with the rest of her. Her butt now stuck out 120'', Bust: W-cups, Height: 9'. She thought, "Hey, bigger is bigger." She grew a 180'' butt, Z-cups, and grew in height to 10 ft. tall. Now her growth is starting to effect her. She is still growing a bigger butt, a bigger bust, and a height.
11533111222.title: Excessiver growth

115331112222.content: She grew bigger and bigger. Eventually she wanted to do something. Go away.
115331112222.title: Taller than Maxwell Kane

choices: was a She-he, and the Smash Fighters laughed.
12.content:
Mordecai, Rigby & Kid was drinking a futuristic soda of some sort when Jenny burst in with a bolt on her forehead. At first they laughed, but when more bolts appeared, she still looked symmetrical. The boys laughed harder, and that's when Mario, Sonic & Tails came to the door, 24 cans of Coca-Cola in hands. When they took a glimpse of Jenny, they didn't just laugh: They told all the Smash Fighters to get 3 more cans of Coke. The Smash Fighters immediately came and laughed. That was when the twist came. Jenny started to puff up and have mood swings, meaning this was the Smash Fighters' fault. Then she had to go, but the Smash Fighters let her sleep over.

The next morning, she...
12.title: It begins

121.content:
The next morning, she was normal.

Kid: Nice Going! You were the talk of the SSBM magazine last night, and now everything, nut to bolt, is normal!

She liked it. So she became a guest until she had to go.

(Hehehehehehe... If you want the story based on the episode, you should have picked the second choice... Hehehehehehe!)
121.title: was normal.

122.content:
The next morning, she was a he-she. Everyone was scared- except the Smash Fighters, who laughed. They thought she looked more hysterical then scary.

Kid: This is funner then when Nick GaS was gotten rid of and Squidbillies aired!

Turns out he made a reference to Dish Network.

Amu: (in her best English) Jenny's character is not mine.
122.title: was a She-he, and the Smash Fighters laughed.

1221.content:
It's been 8 days since anybody other then the Smash Fighters visited. Jenny expanded by an inch every hour, her voice deepened, and she was a total mess. Everybody laughed. Jenny stood a complete mess.

So the alien thing exited out of our main focus and went into Ami.
1221.title: A week later...

choices: Katniss grew her covered up parts.
12212.content:
Ami didn't notice. So Coke was sent here & there. 4869849 cans from the U.S.A.

Then...

(knocking)

Katniss: Hello?

Kid: (Who the heck is she?)

Katniss: So, it was Jenny who got infected!

Kid: (holds camera)

Camera: (click!)

Katniss was made the hit with a SSBM book and along with Jenny in SSBM magazine.

Kid: What happened then?
12212.title: Ami didn't notice.

122122.content:
Katniss expanded by 8 inches every day!

Sonic: You Know, you may be a giantess in no time!

But she grew up to 7 feet, the height of an NBA player!
122122.title: Katniss grew in height.

1221222.content:
Now she expands by 1 foot taller every day!

30 days later, she is a giantess.
1221222.title: Katniss accelerates her growth!

13.content:
After 1,000 years, Kid still goes around-the-clock, collecting souls. What Kid needs, is to go around-the-world. So he keeps getting called Earthican. He wanted to correct the people, but he couldn't. It was hopeless. Until he saw this mutant-human.

Kid: I'm Death the Kid.

Leela: Name's Leela. And this is my pet...
13.title: 3000 (during Futurama)

14.content:
Kid: Ponies are boring!

Finn: Ain't that the truth!

Pit: I get annoyed looking at them!

Mordecai: Ponies are a bunch of junk!

Rigby: YEEEAAAAHHH!

Kid: Yeah. Ponies are WORSE than junk.

Finn: They're-

Sonic: I found out who really thinks ponies should not exist, and that is me. I had to walk through miles of Equestrian stuff last morning. It ain't pretty. It was just to get a Coke. And I'm the fastest thing in Mobius!

Link: Yeah, so?

Pit: PONIES ARE BORING! (writes on sandstone)

Sonic: Ponies are not smart. That's what it reads.

Twilight: (I'd better go to the Transformation Station!)

Sonic: Someone see a flea?

Kid: That's no flea, It's a pony!

Sonic: You may have been looking through a telescope!

The next day...

Finn: Sonic told us to meet here.

Sonic: Okay. Mario is here.

Mario: Yes!

Finn: Get on with it!

Sonic: I-

(stomp! stomp! stomp!)

Sonic: Um, there's the time of the year. A solar eclipse.

Pit: I see.

Sonic: Whoa! You're an e-e-e-e-e-e-

Twilight: Neko giantess.

Sonic: You're blocking sunlight!

Tails: Hey! Aww...

Sonic: Wait a minute... You've been using the Transformation Station again, haven't you? It has to cool off every 99 days after usage. The last time it was used was 97 days ago.

Tails: Make that 98.

Sonic: This is bad. The results will be rendered PERMANENT.

Tails: PERMANENT?

Sonic: Anonymous people may want to leave.

Twilight: What's happening?

Sonic: 99 DAYS AFTER USAGE, YOU USED IT!

Twilight: (My waistline! Hey, what's going on?)

Sonic: Hey! I didn't set it up! (Her bustline is growing, and her belly...)

Twilight: Turning... Evil...

Sonic: Do we HAVE to go over this concept? THERE'S! NO! MARE! IN! THE! MOON!

Twilight: Hahaha! Your stupid Transformation Station rendered my badness permanent!

Sonic: Has your voice become more villainous?

Twilight: Yeah.

Sonic: Transformation Station.
14.title: Present Day

info.description:
Characters:

Mandatory:
Mario or Luigi
Any of the recruits:
Conker the Squirrel
Rainbow Dash
Mordecai or Rigby
Twilight Sparkle
Death the Kid
Hinamori Amu
Hinamori Ami
Finn or Jake

Optional:
Sonic / or Miles
Hatsune Miku
Link
Princess Peach
Pit
Uncle Grandpa
XJ-9 (Jenny)
Any Smash Fighter else

Not Allowed
Any character not listed

When you reach a point where there are two characters, add the options (ex. Chara 1, Chara 2, or Both). Meaning Chara 1 becomes Finn or Mordecai, and Chara 2 becomes Jake or Rigby.

Items:

Allowed:
Super Mushrooms
Poison Mushrooms
Starmen
Cloaking Devices
Metal Boxes
Screw Attacks
Poke Balls
Bomb-ombs
Bunny Hoods
Warp Stars
Parasols
Capsules (must contain one of above items)

Not allowed:
Any item not listed above
Exploding Capsules

Rules:

Character selection is allowed.

No Cussing.

Mushroom Code is once again the default code in the story.

Don't put in the title of the story 3637585758 times in the entire story. Keep it to 0 times, please.

Use good grammer (don't put in "Mario used a Srcew Acttak.") The translation for Srcew Acttak is Screw Attack.

Mention of Coca-Cola is allowed, but please don't mention Coke all the time.

Update 9/20/13: You can now add these Solosis-like things inside balloons, but they are completely female. Expand the balloon, the organism gets taller. Available only in 1998 storyline.

Update 10/12/13: I've added a new storyline that takes place in 3000 yesterday. Kid gets frozen for a thousand years... But at what cost?

If you don't follow the rules (ex. cussing and lots of mentioning of Coke and "The Super Mushroom had no effect" and the title 5 times), your chapter can be deleted, but since I am nice, the first four violations will result in your chapters being edited. Any further violation will consider your chapters doomed to be deleted.
